sections.title: Overview: Alteryx Text Mining Suite vs Arcwise AI
paragraphs: Alteryx Text Mining Suite is The Alteryx Text Mining Suite is a comprehensive, no-code/low-code text analytics platform designed to extract insights from unstructured data. It enables business analysts and data scientists to perform advanced NLP tasks like sentiment analysis, topic modeling, and named entity recognition through a visual, drag-and-drop workflow interface. Its key differentiator is deep integration within the broader Alteryx Analytics Automation Platform, allowing users to seamlessly combine text mining with data blending, predictive analytics, and reporting for end-to-end business intelligence.. It's known for text-analytics, business-intelligence, no-code-nlp.

Arcwise AI, on the other hand, is AI copilot for spreadsheets that understands context and performs complex data analysis using natural language. Integrates with Google Sheets and Excel to automate data cleaning, analysis, and visualization for business users and analysts.. Users choose it for spreadsheet-ai, data-analysis, business-intelligence.
